{{RecipeInfobox}}

Equipping a torch in the [[Weapon|Off Hand Weapon]] slot reduces the time of the [[Quest|quests]] :Forest:[[Forest]], :Swamp:[[Swamp]] and :Valley:[[Valley]] by one minute, but only at the [[Time|time of day]] night. It also increases the loot found at night in Forest. Torches can randomly break during quests.
